images.title: Black-Turmeric Flower
images.description: Amazing and rare: Flower of black turmeric plant
images.detailedDescription: Turmeric flowers blossom when the ambient conditions are perfect for their growth and propagation.

images.title: Black-Ginger Flower
images.description: Amazing and rare: Flower of black ginger plant
images.detailedDescription: Ginger flowers blossom when the ambient conditions are perfect for their growth and propagation.

images.title: Yellow Turmeric Fingers
images.description: Broken fingers of Lakadong variety turmeric fingers
images.detailedDescription: Lakadong variety fingers have their characteristic color and fragrance. They have high curcumin content.
